PATIENT_ID: TEST_SOLID_ORGAN_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-09 08:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-09 08:10:00
Category III activation for 62-year-old female. Fall from standing height.
Landed on outstretched hand. Right wrist deformity and swelling.
BP 132/80, HR 70, RR 14, GCS 15.
No chest, abdominal, or pelvic tenderness.
No signs of internal injury.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-09 08:30:00
Right wrist x-ray: displaced distal radius fracture.
No abdominal imaging indicated or obtained.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-09 08:50:00
Isolated distal radius fracture. Reduced and splinted.
Orthopedic follow-up arranged. Discharged in stable condition.
